 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָתַר‎</span>] **verb** ==pray, supplicafe== (always to God) (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***slaughter for sacrifice*** [[BDB#De|De]]<sup>Gn (4) 381</sup> [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Skizzen iii. 115, 166; Heid. (2). 118, 142</sup>; [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Sem i. 210 f.; 2nd ed.; 227 f.</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֶעְתַּר לי‎</span> [[Gen.25.21|Gen 25:21]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶליֿ‎</span> [[Exod.8.26|Exod 8:26]]; [[Exod.10.18|Exod 10:18]];  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶעְתַּד אֶלאֱֿלוֺהַּ‎</span> [[Job.33.26|Job 33:26]]. **Niph\`al** ***be supplicated, entreated*** (and grant entreaty; always of God), usually with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of worshipper (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> **5 d**): ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנֶעְתַּר לָהֶם‎</span> [[Isa.19.22|Isa 19:22]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵּעָ֫תֶר לוֺ‎</span> [[Gen.25.21|Gen 25:21]]; [[2Chr.33.13|2Chr 33:13]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵּעָתֵר לָנוּ‎</span> [[Ezra.8.23|Ezra 8:23]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָאָרֶץ‎</span> ***for the land*** [[2Sam.21.14|2Sam 21:14]]; [[2Sam.24.25|2Sam 24:25]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָהֶם וְנַעְתּוֺר‎</span> [[1Chr.5.20|1Chr 5:20]] construct (as substantive) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵעָתֶרלֿוֺ‎</span> [[2Chr.33.19|2Chr 33:19]]. **Hiph\`il** = **Qal**, ***make supplication***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span>: ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהַעְתַּרְתִּ֫י אֶליֿ‎</span> [[Exod.8.25|Exod 8:25]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּעְתִּיר אֵלָיו‎</span> [[Job.22.27|Job 22:27]] ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַעְתִּירוּ אֶליֿ‎</span> [[Exod.8.4|Exod 8:4]]; [[Exod.9.28|Exod 9:28]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לי‎</span> [[Exod.10.17|Exod 10:17]] also with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person ***in behalf of*** whom, ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַעְתִּיר לְךָ‎</span> [[Exod.8.5|Exod 8:5]], so ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַעְתִּירוּ‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעֲדִי‎</span> v.[[Exod.8.24|Exod 8:24]].
